archimate:Requirement.name: PM.2.3.3g: g) voice communication services and conferencing equipment, including teleconference and videoconference facilities (e.g. speakers, cameras and display screens) and collaboration platforms
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
